daruwage malasirura balimata mawak illasiti kala owunwa adhairya kirimata ha eya walakimata winnambauwan ha dostharayan sadi pahadi sita atha.lankawe menma athi balawantha sathange spanynya katholika palliya mema aparadhaya “manushath bawata erehi jathika aparadhayak” lesa salakimata erate nithi paddhathiyata ida thabuwe natha.

eksath jathinge wesak uthsawaya  thayilanthayedi eksath jathinge wesak uthsawaya ha 2600 wani sambuddhawa jayanthiya samarime uthsawaya anidda (31 wanida) thayilanthayedi aarambha we. 2001 wasaredi niwyork nuwara eksath jathinge mulasthanayedi mehi palamu samaru uthsawaya pawathi athara, 2004 wasare sita thayilanthaye chulalankon rajakiya wishwawidyalaya magin uthsawakarayen meya samaranu labayi.
ape weda wattoruwala kowid 19 nathi wenna puluwan.
